children.docstring: - Support for PHP 8.5
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Adjusted `guzzlehttp/promises` version constraint to `^2.3` - Adjusted `guzzlehttp/psr7` version constraint to `^2.8`
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Remove explicit content-length header for GET requests - Improve compatibility with bad servers for boolean cookie values
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Adjusted handler selection to use cURL if its version is 7.21.2 or higher, rather than 7.34.0
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Fix TLS 1.3 check for HTTP/2 requests
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Improve protocol version checks to provide feedback around unsupported protocols - Only select the cURL handler by default if 7.34.0 or higher is li
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Support for PHP 8.4
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Updated links in docs to their canonical versions - Replaced `call_user_func*` with native calls
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Support for PHP 8.3 - Added automatic closing of handles on `CurlFactory` object destruction
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Remove the need for `AllowDynamicProperties` in `CurlMultiHandler`
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Support `guzzlehttp/promises` v2
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Fix `SetCookie::fromString` MaxAge deprecation warning and skip invalid MaxAge values
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Support for setting the minimum TLS version in a unified way - Apply on request the version set in options parameters
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Fixed set cookie constructor validation - Fixed handling of files with `'0'` body
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Corrected docs and default connect timeout value to 300 seconds
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Fixed `NO_PROXY` settings so that setting the `proxy` option to `no` overrides the env variable
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Adjusted `guzzlehttp/psr7` version constraint to `^1.9.1 || ^2.4.5`
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Support PHP 8.2 - Add request to delay closure params
children.name: Added

children.docstring: * Fix change in port should be considered a change in origin * Fix `CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH` option not cleared on change of origin
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * Fix failure to strip Authorization header on HTTP downgrade * Fix failure to strip the Cookie header on change in host or HTTP downgrade
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * Fix cross-domain cookie leakage
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Remove curl auth on cross-domain redirects to align with the Authorization HTTP header - Reject non-HTTP schemes in StreamHandler - Set a default ss
children.name: Fixed

children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Only close curl handle if it's done [#2950](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/2950)
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Support PHP 8.1 [#2929](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/2929), [#2939](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/2939) - Support `psr/log` version
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Make sure we always call `restore_error_handler()` [#2915](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/2915) - Fix progress parameter type compatibility b
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Be more strict with types [#2914](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/2914), [#2917](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/2917), [#2919](https://
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Support for DER and P12 certificates [#2413](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/2413) - Support the cURL (http://) scheme for StreamHandler proxi
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Handle exceptions on invalid header consistently between PHP versions and handlers [#2872](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/2872)
children.name: Fixed

children.name: Added

children.name: Fixed

children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Using environment variable GUZZLE_CURL_SELECT_TIMEOUT [#2786](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/2786)
children.name: Deprecated

children.docstring: - Incorrect EOF detection for response body streams on Windows.
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - We dont connect curl `sink` on HEAD requests. - Removed some PHP 5 workarounds

children.docstring: - `GuzzleHttp\MessageFormatterInterface`
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Fixed issue that caused cookies with no value not to be stored. - On redirects, we allow all safe methods like GET, HEAD and OPTIONS. - Fixed loggin

children.name: Deprecated

symbols.docstring: The diff might look very big but 95% of Guzzle users will be able to upgrade without modification. Please see [the upgrade document](UPGRADING.md) tha
symbols.name: 7.0.0-beta1 - 2019-12-30

symbols.docstring: * idn_to_ascii() fix for old PHP versions [#2489](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/2489)
* Better defaults for PHP installations with old ICU lib [#2454](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/2454) * IDN support for redirects [#2424](https
* Improvement: Added support for reset internal queue in MockHandler. [#2143](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/2143) * Improvement: Added support
* No `guzzle.phar` was created in 6.4.0 due expired API token. This release will fix that * Added `parent::__construct()` to `FileCookieJar` and `Sess
* Improvement: Improved error messages when using curl < 7.21.2 [#2108](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/2108) * Fix: Test if response is readabl
* Fix: Default headers when decode_content is specified
* Fix: Release process
* Bug fix: Parsing 0 epoch expiry times in cookies [#2014](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/2014) * Improvement: Better ConnectException detectio
* Feature: force IP resolution (ipv4 or ipv6) [#1608](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/1608), [#1659](https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/1659)
* Fix deprecations with guzzle/psr7 version 1.4
* Allow to pass nullable Response to delay callable * Only add scheme when host is present * Fix drain case where content-length is the literal string
* Address HTTP_PROXY security vulnerability, CVE-2016-5385: https://httpoxy.org/ * Fixing timeout bug with StreamHandler: https://github.com/guzzle/gu
* Feature: added `GuzzleHttp\json_encode` and `GuzzleHttp\json_decode`. https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/1389 * Bug fix: Fix sleep calculation wh
* Bug fix: Proxy::wrapSync() now correctly proxies to the appropriate handler https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/commit/911bcbc8b434adce64e223a6d1d14e9a
* Feature: Added the `on_stats` request option to provide access to transfer statistics for requests. https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/1202 * Fea
* Fixed a memory leak in the curl handlers in which references to callbacks were not being removed by `curl_reset`. * Cookies are now extracted proper
* Fixed a bug with serializing the `query` request option where the `&` separator was missing. * Added a better error message for when `body` is provi
* See the UPGRADING.md document for more information. * Added `multipart` and `form_params` request options. * Added `synchronous` request option. * A
* Mock now supports `save_to` * Marked `AbstractRequestEvent::getTransaction()` as public. * Fixed a bug in which multiple headers using different cas
* Requires PHP >= 5.5 * Updated to use PSR-7 * Requires immutable messages, which basically means an event based system owned by a request instance is
symbols.name: 6.0.0-beta.1

symbols.docstring: * Added `AppliesHeadersInterface` to make applying headers to a request based on the body more generic and not specific to `PostBodyInterface`. * Redu
* Pool class no longer uses recursion when a request is intercepted. * The size of a Pool can now be dynamically adjusted using a callback. See https:
This change updates query strings so that they are treated as un-encoded values by default where the value represents an un-encoded value to send over
* Added a trailing `\r\n` to multipart/form-data payloads. See https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/pull/871 * Added a `GuzzleHttp\Pool::send()` convenien
Bugfix release.

children.docstring: * Added support for non-blocking responses based on `guzzlehttp/guzzle-ring`. * Added a public API for creating a default HTTP adapter. * Updated the
children.name: New Features

children.docstring: The breaking changes in this release are relatively minor. The biggest thing to look out for is that request and response objects no longer implement
children.name: Breaking changes

symbols.docstring: Adding support for non-blocking responses and some minor API cleanup.
* Fixed a memory leak in the CurlAdapter when reusing cURL handles. * No longer using `request_fulluri` in stream adapter proxies. * Relative redirect
* Ensuring that the StreamAdapter does not always add a Content-Type header * Adding automated github releases with a phar and zip
* Now merging in default options using a case-insensitive comparison. Closes https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/issues/767 * Added the ability to automa
* Fixed an issue in the CurlFactory that caused setting the `stream=false` request option to throw an exception. See: https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle
* Fixed an error in the HistoryPlugin that caused the same request and response to be logged multiple times when an HTTP protocol error occurs. * Ensu
* Added helper methods to make it easier to represent messages as strings, including getting the start line and getting headers as a string.
* Automatically retrying cURL "Connection died, retrying a fresh connect" errors when possible. * cURL implementation cleanup * Allowing multiple even
* Fixed a bug that caused multi-part POST requests with more than one field to serialize incorrectly. * Paths can now be set to "0" * `ResponseInterfa
* Various fixes to multipart/form-data POST uploads * Wrapping function.php in an if-statement to ensure Guzzle can be used globally and in a Composer
* Added support for sending payloads with GET requests
* Fixed an issue related to using custom message factory options in subclasses * Fixed an issue with nested form fields in a multi-part POST * Fixed a
* Added a `json` request option to easily serialize JSON payloads. * Added a `GuzzleHttp\json_decode()` wrapper to safely parse JSON. * Added `setPort
* The HTTP status code of a response is now set as the exception code of RequestException objects. * 303 redirects will now correctly switch from POST
* For information on changes and upgrading, see: https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/blob/master/UPGRADING.md#3x-to-40 * Added `GuzzleHttp\batch()` as a
* Removed `getConfig()` and `setConfig()` from clients to avoid confusion around whether things like base_url, message_factory, etc. should be able to
symbols.name: 4.0.0.rc-2 - 2014-03-25

symbols.docstring: * See https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/blob/master/UPGRADING.md#3x-to-40
symbols.name: 4.0.0-rc.1 - 2014-03-15

symbols.docstring: * Bug: Always using GET requests when redirecting from a 303 response * Bug: CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST is now correctly set to false when setting `$certi
* Added the ability to define a POST name for a file * JSON response parsing now properly walks additionalProperties * cURL error code 18 is now retri
* Bug fix: 0 is now an allowed value in a description parameter that has a default value (#430) * Bug fix: SchemaFormatter now returns an integer when
* Added the ability to get the exception associated with a request/command when using `MultiTransferException` and `CommandTransferException`. * Setti
* Bug fix: Properly URL encoding paths when using the PHP-only version of the UriTemplate expander See https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle/issues/371 * B
* Bug fix: Setting default options on a client now works * Bug fix: Setting options on HEAD requests now works. See #352 * Bug fix: Moving stream fact
* See UPGRADING.md for more information on how to upgrade. * Requests now support the ability to specify an array of $options when creating a request
* ServiceDescription now implements ToArrayInterface * Added command.hidden_params to blacklist certain headers from being treated as additionalParame
* Bug: Fixed a regression so that request responses are parsed only once per oncomplete event rather than multiple times * Bug: Better cleanup of one-
* Bug fix: Fixing bug introduced in 3.4.2 where redirect responses are duplicated on the final redirected response * Added a check to re-extract the t
* Bug fix: Stream objects now work correctly with "a" and "a+" modes * Bug fix: Removing `Transfer-Encoding: chunked` header when a Content-Length is
* Large refactoring to how CurlMulti handles work. There is now a proxy that sits in front of a pool of CurlMulti handles. This greatly simplifies the
* Bug fix: URLs are now resolved correctly based on https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc3986#section-5.2. #289 * Bug fix: Absolute URLs with a pa
* Added the ability to create PHP streaming responses from HTTP requests * Bug fix: Running any filters when parsing response headers with service des
* A large number of performance optimizations have been made * Bug fix: Added 'wb' as a valid write mode for streams * Bug fix: `Guzzle\Http\Message\R
* CurlMulti is no longer reused globally. A new multi object is created per-client. This helps to isolate clients. * URLs with no path no longer conta
* Refactored how operation responses are parsed. Visitors now include a before() method responsible for parsing the response body. For example, the Xm
* Adding wildcard support to Guzzle\Common\Collection::getPath() * Adding alias support to ServiceBuilder configs * Adding Guzzle\Service\Resource\Com
* BC: CurlException now extends from RequestException rather than BadResponseException * BC: Renamed Guzzle\Plugin\Cache\CanCacheStrategyInterface::ca
* Fixing phar detection when forcing a cacert to system if null or true * Allowing filename to be passed to `Guzzle\Http\Message\Request::setResponseB
* CurlMulti performance improvements * Adding setErrorResponses() to Operation * composer.json tweaks
* Bug: Fixing an infinite recursion bug caused from revalidating with the CachePlugin * Bug: Response body can now be a string containing "0" * Bug: U
* Bug: Fixed a bug when adding multiple cookies to a request to use the correct glue value * Bug: Cookies can now be added that have a name, domain, o
* Implementing redirects in PHP rather than cURL * Added PECL URI template extension and using as default parser if available * Bug: Fixed Content-Len
* Magic methods are enabled by default on clients * Magic methods return the result of a command * Service clients no longer require a base_url option
* Models can now be used like regular collection objects by calling filter, map, etc. * Models no longer require a Parameter structure or initial data
* Rewrote service description format to be based on Swagger * Now based on JSON schema * Added nested input structures and nested response models * Su
* Bug: Fixed a cookie issue that caused dot prefixed domains to not match where popular browsers did
* Bug: Fixed config file aliases for JSON includes * Bug: Fixed cookie bug on a request object by using CookieParser to parse cookies on requests * Bu
* Added the ability to modify and build service descriptions * Added the use of visitors to apply parameters to locations in service descriptions usin
* Bug: Suppressed empty arrays from URI templates * Bug: Added the missing $options argument from ServiceDescription::factory to enable caching * Adde
* Bug: Custom delay time calculations are no longer ignored in the ExponentialBackoffPlugin * Added the ability to transfer entity bodies as a string
* Bug: Fixed a case where empty POST requests were sent as GET requests * Bug: Fixed a bug in ExponentialBackoffPlugin that caused fatal errors when r
* Bug: Query string values set to 0 are no longer dropped from the query string * Bug: A Collection object is no longer created each time a call is ma
* Loosening Event Dispatcher dependency * POST redirects can now be customized using CURLOPT_POSTREDIR
* BC: Guzzle\Http\Query * Query strings with empty variables will always show an equal sign unless the variable is set to QueryString::BLANK (e.g. ?ac
* BC: Moving things to get ready for subtree splits. Moving Inflection into Common. Moving Guzzle\Http\Parser to Guzzle\Parser. * BC: Removing Guzzle\
* Minor patch to update version number in UA string * Updating build process
* BC: Inflection classes moved to Guzzle\Inflection. No longer static methods. Can now inject custom inflectors into classes. * BC: Removed magic setX
* BC: Removing Guzzle\Http\Plugin\BatchQueuePlugin * BC: Removing Guzzle\Service\Command\CommandSet * Adding generic batching system (replaces the bat
* BC: Renaming Guzzle\Http\Message\RequestInterface::getResourceUri() to getResource() * BC: Removing unused AUTH_BASIC and AUTH_DIGEST constants from
* BC: Cleaning up how POST files are stored in EntityEnclosingRequest objects. Adding PostFile class. * BC: Moving ApiCommand specific functionality f
* [BC] Guzzle\Common\FromConfigInterface no longer requires any config options. * [BC] Refactoring how POST files are stored on an EntityEnclosingRequ
* [Http] Better handling of nested scope requests in CurlMulti.  Requests are now always prepares in the send() method rather than the addRequest() me
* [BC] Removing 'path' support in service descriptions.  Use 'uri'. * [BC] Guzzle\Service\Inspector::parseDocBlock is now protected. Adding getApiPara
* [BC] Moving Guzzle\Service\Builder to Guzzle\Service\Builder\ServiceBuilder * [BC] Executing a Command returns the result of the command rather than
* Major performance improvements * [BC] Simplifying Guzzle\Common\Collection.  Please check to see if you are using features that are now deprecated.
We use GitHub issues only to discuss bugs and new features. For support please refer to:

symbols.docstring: The recommended way to install Guzzle is through [Composer](https://getcomposer.org/).
symbols.name: Installing Guzzle

symbols.name: For Enterprise

symbols.docstring: - Class `GuzzleHttp\UriTemplate` is removed. - Class `GuzzleHttp\Exception\SeekException` is removed. - Classes `GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseExcep
symbols.name: Other backwards compatibility breaking changes

symbols.docstring: All internal native functions calls of Guzzle are now prefixed with a slash. This change makes it impossible for method overloading by other libraries
symbols.name: Native functions calls

symbols.docstring: The change to PSR-7 unfortunately required significant refactoring to Guzzle due to the fact that PSR-7 messages are immutable. Guzzle 5 relied on an
symbols.name: Migrating to middleware

symbols.docstring: This version added the [`form_params`](https://docs.guzzlephp.org/en/latest/request-options.html#form_params) and `multipart` request options. `form_p
symbols.name: POST Requests

symbols.docstring: Guzzle now uses [RingPHP](https://ringphp.readthedocs.org/en/latest) to send HTTP requests. The `adapter` option in a `GuzzleHttp\Client` constructor
symbols.name: Rewritten Adapter Layer

symbols.docstring: [Fluent interfaces were removed](https://ocramius.github.io/blog/fluent-interfaces-are-evil/) from the following classes:
symbols.name: Removed Fluent Interfaces

symbols.docstring: Removed "functions.php", so that Guzzle is truly PSR-4 compliant. The following functions can be used as replacements.
symbols.name: Removed functions.php

symbols.docstring: The concept of "throwImmediately" has been removed from exceptions and error events. This control mechanism was used to stop a transfer of concurrent
symbols.name: `throwImmediately` has been removed

symbols.docstring: Removed the "headers" event. This event was only useful for changing the body a response once the headers of the response were known. You can implemen
symbols.name: headers event has been removed

symbols.docstring: Removed the `asArray` parameter from `GuzzleHttp\Message\MessageInterface::getHeader`. If you want to get a header value as an array, then use the new
symbols.name: Updates to HTTP Messages

symbols.docstring: - Now requires PHP 5.4 or greater. - No longer requires cURL to send requests. - Guzzle no longer wraps every exception it throws. Only exceptions tha
symbols.name: Overarching changes:

symbols.docstring: The `Guzzle\Batch` namespace has been removed. This is best left to third-parties to implement on top of Guzzle's core HTTP library.
symbols.name: Batch

symbols.docstring: The `Guzzle\Cache` namespace has been removed. (Todo: No suitable replacement has been implemented yet, but hoping to utilize a PSR cache interface).
symbols.name: Cache

children.docstring: - `getAll` has been removed. Use `toArray` to convert a collection to an array. - `inject` has been removed. - `keySearch` has been removed. - `getPat
children.name: Collection

children.docstring: - Use the `once()` method to add a listener that automatically removes itself the first time it is invoked. - Use the `listeners()` method to retrieve
children.name: Emitter

children.docstring: Guzzle no longer requires Symfony's EventDispatcher component. Guzzle now uses `GuzzleHttp\Event\Emitter`.
children.name: Events

symbols.docstring: - Removed all of the wrapped exceptions. It's better to use the standard PHP library for unrecoverable exceptions. - `FromConfigInterface` has been re
symbols.name: Common

children.docstring: - The cacert.pem certificate has been moved to `src/cacert.pem`. - Added the concept of adapters that are used to transfer requests over the wire. - S
children.name: General changes

children.docstring: Calling methods like `get()`, `post()`, `head()`, etc. no longer create and return a request, but rather creates a request, sends the request, and ret
children.name: Client

children.docstring: - `GuzzleHttp\Message\EntityEnclosingRequest` and `GuzzleHttp\Message\EntityEnclosingRequestInterface` have been removed. The separation between reque
children.name: Requests with a body

children.docstring: - `GuzzleHttp\Message\Header` has been removed. Header values are now simply represented by an array of values or as a string. Header values are retur
children.name: Headers

children.docstring: - `GuzzleHttp\Message\Response::getInfo()` and `GuzzleHttp\Message\Response::setInfo()` have been removed. Use the event system to retrieve this type
children.name: Responses

children.docstring: Streaming requests can now be created by a client directly, returning a `GuzzleHttp\Message\ResponseInterface` object that contains a body stream refe
children.name: Streaming responses

children.docstring: The `configureRedirects()` method has been removed in favor of a `allow_redirects` request option.
children.name: Redirects

children.docstring: EntityBody interfaces and classes have been removed or moved to `GuzzleHttp\Stream`. All classes and interfaces that once required `GuzzleHttp\EntityB
children.name: EntityBody

children.docstring: Requests previously submitted a large number of requests. The number of events emitted over the lifecycle of a request has been significantly reduced
children.name: Request lifecycle events

children.docstring: Messages no longer have references to their counterparts (i.e., a request no longer has a reference to it's response, and a response no loger has a re
children.name: Messages

symbols.docstring: The `Guzzle\Inflection` namespace has been removed. This is not a core concern of Guzzle.
symbols.name: Inflection

symbols.docstring: The `Guzzle\Iterator` namespace has been removed.
symbols.name: Iterator

symbols.docstring: The LogPlugin has moved to https://github.com/guzzle/log-subscriber. The `Guzzle\Log` namespace has been removed. Guzzle now relies on `Psr\Log\Logger
symbols.name: Log

symbols.docstring: The `Guzzle\Parser` namespace has been removed. This was previously used to make it possible to plug in custom parsers for cookies, messages, URI temp
symbols.name: Parser

symbols.docstring: The `Guzzle\Plugin` namespace has been renamed to `GuzzleHttp\Subscriber`. Several plugins are shipping with the core Guzzle library under this namesp
symbols.name: Plugin

symbols.docstring: The service description layer of Guzzle has moved into two separate packages:
symbols.name: Service

symbols.docstring: Stream have moved to a separate package available at https://github.com/guzzle/streams.
symbols.name: Stream

symbols.docstring: - `getStream` and `setStream` have been removed to better encapsulate streams. - `getMetadata` and `setMetadata` have been removed in favor of `Guzzle
symbols.name: Removed methods from StreamInterface

symbols.docstring: - `detachStream` has been renamed to `detach`. - `feof` has been renamed to `eof`. - `ftell` has been renamed to `tell`. - `readLine` has moved from a
symbols.name: Renamed methods

symbols.docstring: `GuzzleHttp\Stream\MetadataStreamInterface` has been added to denote streams that contain additional metadata accessible via `getMetadata()`. `GuzzleH
symbols.name: Metadata streams

children.docstring: - You can now enable E_USER_DEPRECATED warnings to see if you are using any deprecated methods.:
children.name: Deprecations

children.docstring: Additions and changes (you will need to update any implementations or subclasses you may have created):
children.name: Interface changes

children.docstring: - CacheKeyProviderInterface and DefaultCacheKeyProvider are no longer used. All of this logic is handled in a CacheStorageInterface. These two objects
children.name: Cache plugin breaking changes

children.docstring: * Removed from interface: Guzzle\Http\ClientInterface::setUriTemplate * Removed from interface: Guzzle\Http\ClientInterface::setCurlMulti() * Removed
children.name: Interface changes

children.docstring: * Removed Guzzle\Parser\ParserRegister::get(). Use getParser() * Removed Guzzle\Parser\ParserRegister::set(). Use registerParser().
children.name: Removed deprecated functions

children.docstring: * The ability to case-insensitively search for header values * Guzzle\Http\Message\Header::hasExactHeader * Guzzle\Http\Message\Header::raw. Use getAl
children.name: Deprecations

children.docstring: * All response header helper functions return a string rather than mixing Header objects and strings inconsistently * Removed cURL blacklist support.
children.name: Other changes

children.docstring: `Guzzle\Http\Message\Response::getEtag()` no longer strips quotes around the ETag response header
children.name: Response::getEtag() quote stripping removed

children.docstring: The `Guzzle\Http\Utils` class was removed. This class was only used for testing.
children.name: Removed `Guzzle\Http\Utils`

children.docstring: `Guzzle\Stream\Stream::getWrapper()` and `Guzzle\Stream\Stream::getStreamType()` are no longer converted to lowercase.
children.name: Stream wrapper and type

children.docstring: Emitting IO events from a RequestMediator is now a parameter that must be set in a request's curl options using the 'emit_io' key. This was previously
children.name: curl.emit_io became emit_io

children.docstring: Before 3.2, the same CurlMulti object was reused globally for each client. This can cause issue where plugins added to a single client can pollute req
children.name: CurlMulti is no longer reused globally

children.docstring: URLs no longer have a default path value of '/' if no path was specified.
children.name: No default path

children.docstring: The exception message for `Guzzle\Http\Exception\BadResponseException` no longer contains the full HTTP request and response information. You can, how
children.name: Less verbose BadResponseException

children.docstring: Multi-valued query parameters are no longer aggregated using a callback function. `Guzzle\Http\Query` now has a setAggregator() method that accepts a
children.name: Query parameter aggregation

children.docstring: Change `\Guzzle\Service\Inspector::fromConfig` to `\Guzzle\Common\Collection::fromConfig`
children.name: Guzzle\Service\Inspector

children.docstring: **Before**
children.name: Convert XML Service Descriptions to JSON

children.docstring: Commands are now called Operations
children.name: Guzzle\Service\Description\ServiceDescription

children.docstring: Namespace is now `Guzzle\Inflection\Inflector`
children.name: Guzzle\Common\Inflection\Inflector

children.docstring: Namespace is now `Guzzle\Plugin`. Many other changes occur within this namespace and are detailed in their own sections below.
children.name: Guzzle\Http\Plugin

children.docstring: Now `Guzzle\Plugin\Log\LogPlugin` and `Guzzle\Log` respectively.
children.name: Guzzle\Http\Plugin\LogPlugin and Guzzle\Common\Log

children.docstring: Now `Guzzle\Plugin\CurlAuth\CurlAuthPlugin`.
children.name: Guzzle\Http\Plugin\CurlAuthPlugin

children.docstring: Now `Guzzle\Plugin\Backoff\BackoffPlugin`, and other changes.
children.name: Guzzle\Http\Plugin\ExponentialBackoffPlugin

symbols.docstring: The entire concept of the StreamRequestFactory has been removed. The way this was used in Guzzle 3 broke the actual interface of sending streaming req
symbols.name: StreamRequestFactory
